page.title: 11LEISURE & RECREATION A-IN-M
page.content:
In Ashton there are a lot of leisure facilities for the young and old. The Leisure Centre provides entertainment for both. There are the two swimming pools, small and large. There are also squash and badminton courts which can be hired for a reasonable price. Also judo and gymnastic groups are open. Around Ashton there are organisations such as Boys Brigade, cubs, brownies and guides.
In Ashton there is also the Three Sisters Recreation Area. Here they have a lake for canoeing and windsurfing. A BMX track has been built which is fun for the kids. In another part of the grounds there is the racing track where go-cart and motorbike races are held. It is like the countryside so you can have long or short walks.
